Još jedan “senator” iz Napolija odlazi kod Rafe u Kinu?
Benitez skuplja bivše pulene

04 Nov 2019

Posle Mareka Hamšika, još jedan dugogodišnji prvotimac Napolija bi mogao da završi kod bivšeg trenera Rafaela Beniteza u Kini.
Španski stručnjak hoće da dovede Hose Mariju Kaljehona.
On je jedan od “senatora” u Napoliju kako Italijani zovu igrače sa dugogodišnjim stažom u jednom klubu. U Napulj je došao leta 2013. godine baš na zahtev tadašanjeg trenera Rafe Beniteza. Bio je jedno od prvih Benitezovih pojačanja zajedno sa tadašnjim saigračima iz Reala, Gonzalom Iguainom i Raulom Albiolom. Istog leta je došao i Benitezov bivši pulen iz Liverpula, golman Pepe Reina.
Interesantno je da Kaljehona zastupa agent Hose Kiljon, koji je dugo godina menadžer i Benitezu. Kao i Albiolu i Reini.
Kaljehonov ugovor sa Napolijem ističe na kraju sezone, a predsednik De Laurentis je već najavio da mu neće biti ponuđen novi pod uslovima koje zahteva španski vezista. Sve ukazuje na to da se saradnja bliži kraju i da bi Kaljehon već na zimu mogao da napusti San Paolo, a Benitez želi da ga dovede u Dalijan Jifang u kojem već igraju poznata imena poput Hamšika, Janika Fereire Karsaka i Salomona Rondona kojeg je Španac trenirao u Njukaslu.
(FOTO: reuters)

Another Napoli "senator" going to Rafa in China?
Benitez collects ex-pulene

04 Nov 2019

After Marek Hamsik, another longtime first-team Napoli player could end up with former coach Rafael Benitez in China.
Spanish expert wants to bring Jose Maria Callehon.
He is one of the "senators" in Napoli as the Italians call players with many years of experience in one club. He arrived in Naples in 2013 at the request of then coach Rafe Benitez. He was one of Benitez's first reinforcements, along with Real's teammates Gonzalo Iguain and Raul Albiol. That same summer came Benitez's former Liverpool pulpit, goalkeeper Pepe Reina.
Interestingly, Callehona is represented by agent Jose Quillon, who has been a manager for many years at Benitez. Like Albiolu and Reina.
Callechon's contract with Napoli expires at the end of the season, and President De Laurentis has already announced that he will not be offered a new one on terms required by the Spanish midfielder. All indications are that the collaboration is nearing its end and that Calahon might leave San Paolo for the winter, and Benitez wants to bring him to Dalyan Jifang, who already plays well-known names like Hamshik, Janik Fereira Karsak and Solomon Rondon, whom the Spaniard trained in Newcastle.
